page.title: 13Religion
page.content: John Wesley died at the age of 88,he wrote some books in his life and was also a famous preacher.{St.Peter's {church}started being built in the 11th Century and was completed in 1870, Ellen Nussey (friend of Charlotte Bronte) and John Nelson buried there. St.Patrick's new church was built in 1971,the old one has two words on the top of a door,The Presbytery,it has a statue of Mary outside the other door. Brownhill{Church}has stained glass windows and each window tells a story of Christmas.There is Mary,Jesus and a lamb on one of them.In the{Birstall {Community Church}is a stage where the organ stands.It has a stained glass window above the clock with a lady called Temperence on.This church started with the Temperence movement in the 19th Century.
